item.title: End contractualization - Sun.Star Philippines
item.description:
End contractualization  Sun.Star Philippines

ON Monday, the country’s working class commemorated the 115th International Labor Day under the Duterte administration with this wish: End labor contractualization scheme practiced by many of our big and small businesses. In rallies nationwide, thousands of Filipino workers reminded President Rodrigo Duterte of his campaign promise to put an end to this labor scheme. But workers are now becoming disenchanted. item.title: Sanchez: When is the end of endo? - Sun.Star Philippines
item.description:
Sanchez: When is the end of endo?  Sun.Star Philippines

ONE thing about homegrown restaurants such as Aboy’s or Bob’s. Aside from the great Filipino dishes, the employees working there seems family. The waiters and probably the cooks are the same people you met, oh, a decade or even more ago. They recognize me, and I them. The only difference is that many already have silver hair, the same ones that I have in my head. They have been working on the same job for years. Obviously they have job tenure. Militant groups give Digong 'zero’ grade  SunStar Philippines

SOME progressive groups in Negros Occidental gave President Rodrigo “Digong” Duterte a “zero rating" in his two years of office.
